name: Musical Instruments 1 Quiz | Musical Instruments | 10 Questions

questions.text: What instrument was formerly on the coins of Ireland?
A violin has how many strings?
What is the name of blues singer B.B. King's guitar?
True or False: In 'Pete Kelly's Blues' Jack Webb's character played the cornet?
In what part of the world did the kettle drum originate?
In what instrument family does the piccolo belong?
Which is not a type of upright piano?
Which has the higher sound,the flute or the piccolo?
What instrument did Lionel Hampton play?
questions.explanation:
Vibraphone.

	The vibraphone is also known as the vibes.

questions.text: The koto is a zither like instrument from what country?
questions.explanation:
Japan.

	It is actually a harp.
